sen.j: 丹後ちりめん（たんごちりめん）は、京都府の丹後地方で生産される高級絹織物のこと。
sen.e: Tango Chirimen is a high-quality silk fabric produced in the Tango region of Kyoto.
Tango Chirimen is a high-quality silk fabric produced in the Tango region of Kyoto Prefecture.
Tango Chirimen is a high-quality silk fabric produced in the Tango region of Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 丹後地方の地場産業であるが近年は低迷している。
sen.e: It is a local industry of the Tango region, but it has been on the decline in the recent years.
It is a local industry of the Tango region, but it has been on the decline in the recent years.
It is a local industry of the Tango region, but it has been on the decline in the recent years.
